text: Arau yidina sihamtara sasti ahiba se'idina samparke tumi manuhaka satarka karaa, tetiya an'yayakaraisakale ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Tumi amaka alapa samayara babe arakasa diya, ami tomara ahbanata samharai dima arau raachulasakalara anusarana karaima’. (Uttarata koraa ha’ba) kiya tomaloke jano iyara agata sapata karai koraa nachila ye, tomalokara ketiya'o patana nahaya
